condition.description:
Pheochromocytoma is a rare tumor that usually starts in the cells of one of your adrenal glands. Although they are usually benign, pheochromocytomas often cause the adrenal gland to make too many hormones. This can lead to high blood pressure and cause symptoms such as

  • Headaches
  • Sweating
  • Pounding of the heart
  • Being shaky
  • Being extremely pale

Sometimes pheochromocytoma is part of another condition called multiple endocrine neoplasia syndrome (MEN). People with MEN often have other cancers and other problems involving hormones.

Doctors use lab tests and imaging tests to diagnose it. Surgery is the most common treatment. Other options include radiation therapy, chemotherapy, and targeted therapy. Targeted therapy uses substances that attack cancer cells without harming normal cells.

NIH: National Cancer Institute
condition.name: Pheochromocytoma

Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

basics.benefits_moa: Propranolol is an alpha and beta blocker. It lowers blood pressure by slowing heart rate, relaxing blood vessels, and lowering the body's fight-or-flight response.
basics.bottom_line: Propranolol is good for treating many heart problems and other problems in the body, but it has more side effects than other beta blockers. You can't miss doses.
downsides: Taking a beta blocker might make you feel more tired or out of breath during exercise or normal daily routines. This gets better for most people, but for some might not go away.
Has more side effects than some beta blockers because it crosses into the brain and central nervous system.

Not a first-choice treatment for high blood pressure according to the latest guidelines, except if you have heart failure or heart disease. As a second choice, your doctor might add it to medicines you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.
Can hide symptoms of low blood sugar if you're diabetic.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Propranolol suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.

downsides_processed.orig: Taking a beta blocker might make you feel more tired or out of breath during exercise or normal daily routines. This gets better for most people, but for some might not go away.
Has more side effects than some beta blockers because it crosses into the brain and central nervous system.

Not a first-choice treatment for high blood pressure according to the latest guidelines, except if you have heart failure or heart disease. As a second choice, your doctor might add it to medicines you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.
Can hide symptoms of low blood sugar if you're diabetic.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Propranolol suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.

upsides: A first-choice treatment to prevent chest pain (angina).
A first-choice treatment for heart failure, heart attack, heart valve disorders, and abnormal heart rhythm.
Also treats and prevents many non-heart problems, such as tremors, anxiety, migraines, and liver disease symptoms.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and controls heart rate.

userStories.tip: Nausea, dizziness and loss of energy.
I actually take it for essential tremor. It works very well. My hands no longer shake which is great.
The worst side effects for me...threw me into a deep depression. Horrendous.
I take it for occasional stage fright.

I've used it for public speaking, it works great totally stops irrriating hand or voice shakes. However; I experienced sudden dizziness after getting up quickly after a period of long period of sitting.
took this to manage shakes from lithium. it worked pretty well.

no issue; take as low of a dose as possible, remember to not skip doses, and prepare for a day when you don't need to take it any longer. completely stopped my anxiety from lasting more than a couple of minutes.
I started taking it for migraine prevention, but then found it completely rid me of my stage fright and issues with public speaking.
I'm taking very short amounts for anxiety since my doctor wants me to calm down but doesn't want to give me any drug that would mess up with my brain. It's working great!
Take it only when you need. It reduces the physical symptoms of anxiety, such as sweating, but it does not help with the mental aspect of anxiety

drugs.name: Propranolol

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can hide symptoms of low blood sugar. Be careful if you're diabetic.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

risks_warnings.title: Increased chest pain or risk of heart attack
risks_warnings.description: Do not stop taking Propranolol suddenly without talking to your doctor as chest pain or angina may become increased. Stopping Propranolol suddenly may start a heart attack. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in stopping this medication.

description_processed.orig: Do not stop taking Propranolol suddenly without talking to your doctor as chest pain or angina may become increased. Stopping Propranolol suddenly may start a heart attack. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in stopping this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Heart failure
risks_warnings.description: Cases of heart failure due to taking Propranolol have been reported. Tell your doctor if you noticed increased swelling around your legs or ankles, sudden weight gain or sudden shortness of breath as these may be symptoms of heart failure.

description_processed.orig: Cases of heart failure due to taking Propranolol have been reported. Tell your doctor if you noticed increased swelling around your legs or ankles, sudden weight gain or sudden shortness of breath as these may be symptoms of heart failure.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risks during surgery
risks_warnings.description: If you are planning to undergo major surgery requiring anesthesia, tell your surgeon that you are on Propranolol, so that they can monitor your heart more closely.

description_processed.orig: If you are planning to undergo major surgery requiring anesthesia, tell your surgeon that you are on Propranolol, so that they can monitor your heart more closely.

risks_warnings.title: Masked symptoms of low blood sugar
risks_warnings.description: Patients on Propranolol who are also diabetic may not recognize symptoms of low blood sugar, except for sweating and dizziness. Talk to your doctor about when to monitor your blood sugar if you are started on Propranolol.

description_processed.orig: Patients on Propranolol who are also diabetic may not recognize symptoms of low blood sugar, except for sweating and dizziness. Talk to your doctor about when to monitor your blood sugar if you are started on Propranolol.

risks_warnings.title: Masked symptoms of overactive thyroid
risks_warnings.description: Patients on Propranolol who also have an overactive thyroid may not recognize signs of hyperthyroidism, such as fast heart rate. Also, do not stop taking Propranolol suddenly without consulting your doctor, as this may start a thyroid storm.

description_processed.orig: Patients on Propranolol who also have an overactive thyroid may not recognize signs of hyperthyroidism, such as fast heart rate. Also, do not stop taking Propranolol suddenly without consulting your doctor, as this may start a thyroid storm.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: You may notice a slowing of your heart rate when you take this medication. You may experience dizziness when you first take the medication. Be careful when getting up from either lying down or sitting to avoid falls. Also tell your doctor if your heart rate goes below 55 beats per minute as they may consider changing your dose. Your doctor may monitor your heart rate and rhythm.
risk_factors: Concurrent use of non-dihydropyridine calcium channel blockers, digoxin or clonidine

description_processed.orig: You may notice a slowing of your heart rate when you take this medication. You may experience dizziness when you first take the medication. Be careful when getting up from either lying down or sitting to avoid falls. Also tell your doctor if your heart rate goes below 55 beats per minute as they may consider changing your dose. Your doctor may monitor your heart rate and rhythm.

risks_warnings.title: Serious skin reactions
risks_warnings.description: Rare reports of skin rash have been reported which may be considered serious to life-threatening. If you notice a sudden severe skin rash with a fever, call your doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rare reports of skin rash have been reported which may be considered serious to life-threatening. If you notice a sudden severe skin rash with a fever, call your doctor immediately.

carousel_items: Can cause dizziness or fainting in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Take the extended release tablet with breakfast.
You might need to check your blood pressure from time to time while taking this medicine.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.

basics.benefits_moa: Doxazosin is a selective alpha blocker. It relaxes the urethra and prostate, which makes it easier to urinate. It also lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels.
basics.bottom_line: For men, Doxazosin will help make it easier to urinate so that you're not getting up a lot at night. It's a last-choice treatment for high blood pressure.
downsides: A last-choice treatment for high blood pressure because other medicines are more effective at preventing heart disease. Your doctor might add it to a medicine you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.

downsides_processed.orig: A last-choice treatment for high blood pressure because other medicines are more effective at preventing heart disease. Your doctor might add it to a medicine you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.

upsides: A first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate. Makes it easier to urinate.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate. Makes it easier to urinate.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and makes it easier to urinate.

userStories.tip: It effects your mood after a few weeks and caused anxiety attacks for me after three months. Also headaches and dizziness on a daily basis. Heart consultant told me to stop taking it. Only a 1mg doseage for me but enough to cause problems
userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping

userStories.tip: Take it at bedtime everyday for BPH symptoms

drugs.name: Cardura

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness or fainting in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Take the extended release tablet with breakfast.
You might need to check your blood pressure from time to time while taking this medicine.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Dizziness or fainting may occur when taking Doxazosin when you change positions, such as going from a seated or lying down position to standing because of changes in your blood pressure, which may lead to falls. This is called orthostatic hypotension. Be very careful when changing positions, especially if you're just starting to take Doxazosin or if changes in dosing have to be made. Talk to your doctor if the dizziness doesn't go away or if you find it bothersome.

description_processed.orig: Dizziness or fainting may occur when taking Doxazosin when you change positions, such as going from a seated or lying down position to standing because of changes in your blood pressure, which may lead to falls. This is called orthostatic hypotension. Be very careful when changing positions, especially if you're just starting to take Doxazosin or if changes in dosing have to be made. Talk to your doctor if the dizziness doesn't go away or if you find it bothersome.

risks_warnings.title: Painful erection
risks_warnings.description: Rare reports of a painful erection unrelieved by sex have been reported by men who take Doxazosin, which is also called priapism. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop this as impotence can happen if this isn't treated in time.

description_processed.orig: Rare reports of a painful erection unrelieved by sex have been reported by men who take Doxazosin, which is also called priapism. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop this as impotence can happen if this isn't treated in time.

risks_warnings.title: Intraoperative floppy iris syndrome
risks_warnings.description: If you are planning to have surgery for cataracts, let your surgeon know that you are taking Doxazosin as a rare condition called intraoperative floppy iris syndrome has been known to happen. Your surgeon will tell you if adjustments need to be made.

description_processed.orig: If you are planning to have surgery for cataracts, let your surgeon know that you are taking Doxazosin as a rare condition called intraoperative floppy iris syndrome has been known to happen. Your surgeon will tell you if adjustments need to be made.
